pli-tv-bu-vb-pc20:2.1.11: “A lot” renders bahukaṃ. This is based on the commentary to bhikkhu pācittiya 10, Sp.2.86: Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṃ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekaṃyeva pācittiyaṃ, “Sakiṃ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti: there is only one offense entailing confession for the one who asks, even if the other digs the entire day.”
